method.comment: check the total space of a partition Dim TotalSpace As Long = p.getTotalSpace("C") Log(TotalSpace/1024/1024) ' Megabytes

method.name: getFreeSpace
method.comment: check the disk free space of a partition Dim freespace As Long = p.getFreeSpace("C") Log(freespace/1024/1024) ' Megabytes

method.name: Get_RandomUuid
method.comment: The Java UUIDv4 implementation uses random numbers as the source. The Java implementation is SecureRandom, which uses an unpredictable value as the seed to generate random numbers to reduce the chance of collisions. Let's generate a unique key using SHA-256 and a random UUID

method.name: Get_HddID1
method.comment: Return Null If No Result Get HardDisk Partition Id

method.name: Linux_MacId
method.comment: Method for Get System MAC Address of Linux based machines. Enter Your machine Name as a Parameter. eth0 look here: More Info Linux_MacId("eth0")

method.name: Get_AllMacIds
method.comment: Get all MAC Addresses on Windows/Linux Return Null If Has No Result Dim macs As List = p.Get_AllMacIds For Each macm As Map In macs For Each k In macm.Keys Log (k & " = " & macm.Get(k)) Next Log (" -----------------------") Next

method.name: Get_HddID4
method.comment: Return Null If No Result Get the ID of the partition of the hard drive Example: Dim p As jUUID Log(p.Get_HddID4("D"))

method.name: Get_HddID3
method.comment: Return Null If No Result Get the ID of the first partition of the hard drive, which is usually named C

method.name: Get_HddID2
method.comment: Return Null If No Result Get HardDisk Serialnumber

get Windows Machine CPU Serial Number
Return Null If has No Result

method.name: Get_HardisksInfo
method.comment: Return all Harddisk List with Pattern Model#Serialnumber#Capacity Each line contains information from one hard disk You Can Split With '#' Example: Dim l As List = p.Get_HardisksInfo For i=0 To l.Size-1 Dim st() As String = Regex.Split("#",l.Get(i)) Log("Model : " & st(0)) Log("Serial : " & st(1)) Log("Capacity : " & st(2)) Next

method.name: DiskSerialWithPowerShell
method.comment:
get all hardDisk SerialNumbers With Powershell
16484B4 # 65H03978 # sdsd540012
